channel.title: [pi] special bar need help please look rep ++
channel.description:
hey why dont i have a special bar this is the vine whip case 13444 ive tryed two different codes for it?
case 4151: // whip case 13444://whip Vine c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 12323); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 12335); break; with this one i dont get errors
Get Blitz told me to add case 13444 under 1231 is that right this is the one i get errors on but if i dont add this one i leave the other one then still i have no special bar
case 1215:// dragon dagger case 1231: case 13444: // vine whip case 13899: case 10887: case 5680: case 13905: case 5698: case 1305: // dragon long case 11694: case 11698: case 11700: //SOL case 11730: case 11696: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7586); break;
as u can see in this picture there is no special bar [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture221.png[/img]

item.title: [pi] special bar need help please look rep ++
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“NotLikingThis, post:4, topic:422442”]Does your regular Whip have a spec bar? Maybe you should see if thats the correct item ID for the Vine Whip. There might be multiple ID’s for it.
EDIT:
I found this in my ItemAssistant.java

[code]public void addSpecialBar(int weapon) {
switch(weapon) {

		case 4151: // whip
		case 15441: // whip
		case 15442: // whip
		case 15443: // whip
		case 15444: // whip
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 12323);
		specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 12335);
		break;[/code]

If you have not added it there i would do that.[/quote]
there different colour whips the 4151 is the normal one

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] special bar need help please look rep ++

item.title: [pi] special bar need help please look rep ++
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Does your regular Whip have a spec bar? Maybe you should see if thats the correct item ID for the Vine Whip. There might be multiple ID’s for it.
EDIT:
I found this in my ItemAssistant.java

[code]public void addSpecialBar(int weapon) {
switch(weapon) {

		case 4151: // whip
		case 15441: // whip
		case 15442: // whip
		case 15443: // whip
		case 15444: // whip
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 12323);
		specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 12335);
		break;[/code]

If you have not added it there i would do that.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] special bar need help please look rep ++

@liamp wrote:

hey why dont i have a special bar this is the vine whip case 13444 ive tryed two different codes for it?

case 4151: // whip
case 13444://whip Vine
c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 12323);
specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 12335);
break;
with this one i dont get errors

Get Blitz told me to add case 13444 under 1231 is that right
this is the one i get errors on but if i dont add this one i leave the other one then still i have no special bar

case 1215:// dragon dagger
case 1231:
case 13444: // vine whip
case 13899:
case 10887:
case 5680:
case 13905:
case 5698:
case 1305: // dragon long
case 11694:
case 11698:
case 11700: //SOL
case 11730:
case 11696:
c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574);
specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7586);
break;

as u can see in this picture there is no special bar
